actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the exemption amount for the alternative minimum tax.
short_title: American Marriage Tax Relief Act of 2007

summary.text: American Marriage Tax Relief Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the exemption amount for the alternative minimum tax on individuals and to provide for an annual inflation adjustment to such increased amount after 2006.

titles.title: American Marriage Tax Relief Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the exemption amount for the alternative minimum tax.
